FuncDef:
The domain-map-list command creates a domain mapping list and displays the domain mapping list view or directly displays the domain mapping list view.
The undo domain-map-list command deletes a domain mapping list.
By default, no domain mapping list is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a domain mapping list.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters. The value cannot be a hyphen (-), two hyphens (--), or a character string that contains an asterisk (*), question mark (?), quotation mark ("), space, or tab character.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a hot backup scenario where a domain name is delivered by the RADIUS server or carried in a packet from a user terminal, the backup device must map the domain name into different domain names for different RBSs to ensure resource independency in the RBSs.
Configuration Impact
The system supports a maximum of four domain mapping lists.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
